website_summaries.verdict: At a budget-friendly price of $52, the Osiris Loot sneakers come packed with skate performance features and smooth, good looks. Most reviewers find the style pleasing, especially as it can be easily styled. Moreover, plenty of colorways are offered.With its level of comfort, Osiris fans find the sneaker to be overall satisfying. However, the toe area is deemed to be too tight, while the arch support leaves much to be desired. Some also find issues with the durability, as it's said to fall apart quickly.
pros: The Osiris Loot is a budget-friendly shoe, with many users commenting that it has a great price
Most testers love the style of the sneaker, finding that it has an awesome look
Many colorways have been released for this model
According to plenty of buyers, the kicks can be styled easily, and they look especially great with pants
It’s comfortable to wear, a lot of wearers have lauded
Several longtime fans of Osiris sneakers find the Osiris Loot shoe to be satisfying overall
Some purchasers say that they will buy this sneaker again
cons: The toe area is too narrow and fits tight, a lot of reviewers have complained
A few users have grumbled in their Osiris Loot reviews that it doesn’t have much arch support
It falls apart much quicker than expected, more than a handful of testers have attested

customer_reviews.title: Follow reviewers' advice and get them a little bigger than your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing these right now. At 32 I decided to go back and try to learn to Ollie. I didn't want to shred any of my nice shoes on grip tape, and these Osiris looked nice and fit the bill price-wise. I followed other posters' advice and bought them larger than I needed and that was the right call, they're pretty snug. That said, they're very comfortable and I consider them a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoe, but...
customer_reviews.text: love the shoe, but its al least a half size small... i should have returned mine, but i thought theyd stretch out or something, nope. they smash my feet, should have went a half size larger. next time ill exchange them. awesome shoe tho, love the color and look!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look, great feel.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I didn't know when I ordered them, but they have a shine to them! Which is super awesome, they fit great, I wish the insole had more cushion though, I'll probably just buy some gel soles, since I'm on my feet alot.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Alex Charles Shepard

customer_reviews.title: sweet shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look good. I like the green and skate shoes are my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size runs very small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, but it is so small I can’t wear it. I wish I had known they ran so small. It’s more like a 13. I even tried to take the inserts out with the hope I might get by with being able to wear it. No go.
customer_reviews.author: aaron green

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!
customer_reviews.text: These run super small!! I would order at least 2 sizes up, if not more! They look great though!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Raiber

customer_reviews.title: Love this sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and feel of this sneaker. I had to exchange for a size up because it runs one size small. But a durable quality made sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Gonesh

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cheap price. Bought two pairs. Dont care if they wear quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: About order
customer_reviews.text: Received faster than expected . I absolutely loved be these shoes .they fit great . Very good company to order from .
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: They run at leassst a whole size small.
customer_reviews.text: They run super small. Ordered a half size bigger, and was still too small. Hot shoes though. Theyre real cute.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The insoles fell apart in less than 2 weeks making the shoes unwearable
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Davis

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't all for a better fit!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are the best I have bought hands down ...
customer_reviews.author: Brett L.Baker

product_meta.title: Osiris Men's Loot Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Looking like a million bucks has never been so affordable. Having the loot on your feet will help keep some loot in your pocket. What could be better
feature_bullets: Iconic styling with reinforced high abrasion areas for superior durability.
Lightweight padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support.
